item.title: 10 Years Later, Re-Reading The First Court Of Thorns & Roses Book Makes Me Want A Long Overdue Story In Book 6 Even More
item.description: Re-reading A Court of Thorns and Roses makes me realize how overdue one story is, 10 years after its release. I hope book 6 finally delivers it.

item.title: Tolkien Made A Good Point About The Return Of The King's Title, But His Complaint Isn't As Relevant Today
item.description: J.R.R. Tolkien once shared his thoughts on the title for The Return of the King, but his point has resolved itself over the 70 years since.

item.title: The Legend Of Ochi Ending Explained: What Happens To Yuri & The Ochi
item.description: The Legend of Ochi tells the story of a girl named Yuri and an Ochi she befriends, and their journey leads up to an emotional ending.

item.title: World's First Sperm Racing Competitors Talk Trash Before Big Competition
item.description: The world's first-ever sperm race is on deck and it's shaping up to be a heavyweight fight ... with plenty of trash talk on the eve of the main event....

item.title: Jennifer Lopez's Ex Casper Smart Hit With Misdemeanor Charges in Cannabis Case
item.description: Jennifer Lopez's ex-lover Casper Smart got smoked by the Los Angeles City Attorney's Office ... 'cause he was just charged with operating an illegal m...
